On Israels Right to Exist and Other Myths

Minnesota is FINALLY changing its state flag

Open Letter to former Macalester President Brian Rosenberg

Israels Genocidal War in Gaza What You Need to Know

There are certain things you expect from a secret organization PERIOD It makes sense that such an organization would  work on some nebulous projects PERIOD It will probably spend time suppressing information about itself PERIOD One thing you might not expect a secret organization to do is house your local government PERIOD

The Whimsical Alternatives Coalition Political Awareness Consortium WACPACwhich is described by the owner Webb White as a group where we search for the answers to life the universe and everythingwill be renting out part of its space at  Snelling Avenue to the Union Park District Council one of  councils contracted by the city of Saint Paul to help engage with the community PERIOD

Union Park DC is a nonprofit and consists of two staff members a board and several committees PERIOD Their district does not include Macalesters campus as it is bounded by Summit Avenue Lexington Parkway University Avenue and the Mississippi River PERIOD

Union Park DC community organizer Michael Johnson told The Mac Weekly that he hopes that moving into  Snelling Ave PERIOD might allow Union Park DC to become more visible PERIOD Johnson said that the WACPAC is mysterious and something about which people in the neighborhood are curious PERIOD

Johnson said that Union Park DC helps citizens in the area take ownership over their space and advocate for their interests and needs. committees often give recommendations to the city on issues that affect the neighborhood for example the soccer stadium that Minnesota United is planning to build near Snelling and University Avenues PERIOD

Johnson added that despite the differences between the WACPAC and Union Park DC both share a commitment to building community PERIOD He said that Union Park DC is paying far below what we should be paying to use the space and that the rental agreement is for two years PERIOD

The move comes alongside a change in the WACPACs public presence PERIOD WACPAC now has a website on which the organization refers to itself as WACPAC .. An unusual webpage next to its hours and contact pagesneither of which list any actual information about its hours or how to contact the organizationcalled Picture Of The King shows just a photograph of Elvis PERIOD

Johnson said that for now the WACPAC will still be hosting private events at  Snelling Ave PERIOD

The Student News Site of Macalester College
